patch.description: Update the policy of a bundle
patch.summary: Update the policy of a bundle

parameters.description: request to update a bundle policy
parameters.name: request

classificationValue.description: The classification value of the primary policy

policyId.description: The ID of the primary policy

stage.description: The stage of the primary policy

stageAssignee.description: The assignee to the stage of the primary policy

isUserApprover.description: Indicates if the current user is an approver for any of the approvals in this bundle policy

visible.description: allows true, false or nil values (if nil, FE can decide to show everything)

isDeactivated.description: if present, true to deactivate the bundle policy, false to activate the inactive bundle policy

stage.description: if present, update the stage for the bundle policy

additionalPolicyIds.description: Optional, for additional policies to be included in the bundle

policyId.description: Primary policy ID for the bundle
if present, update the primary policy of the bundle

stage.description: if present, update the stage of the bundle's primary policy

state.description: if present, update the state of the bundle
